title: Christmas Celebration 2024 - Genna
subtitle: Join Us for Orthodox Christmas
author: Event Committee
excerpt: Join us for our annual Christmas celebration following the Orthodox calendar. Special services, community feast, and children's programs.

sections.title: Christmas Service Schedule
content: We invite all members of our community to join us for the celebration of **Genna** (Orthodox Christmas) on January 7th, 2024.
**Christmas Eve Service:** January 6th at 6:00 PM - Special evening prayers and hymns
**Christmas Day Liturgy:** January 7th at 9:00 AM - Divine Liturgy followed by community celebration

sections.title: Community Feast
content: Following the Christmas Day Liturgy, we will gather for a traditional **community feast** featuring authentic Eritrean and Ethiopian dishes.
All families are welcome to contribute dishes to share. Please coordinate with the Event Committee if you would like to bring food for the celebration.

sections.title: Children's Programs
content: Special activities have been planned for our young members:
- **Christmas story presentation** by the Sunday School children
- **Traditional songs and hymns** in Ge'ez and Tigrinya
- **Gift exchange** for children under 12
- **Cultural activities** showcasing our Orthodox traditions

sections.title: Volunteer Opportunities
content: We need volunteers to help make this celebration successful:
- Setup and decoration team (needed January 6th morning)
- Food service and cleanup crew
- Children's activity coordinators
- Photography and documentation team
Please contact the Event Committee if you can volunteer in any capacity.

sections.title: Important Notes
content: **Parking:** Additional parking will be available at the nearby community center.
**Dress Code:** Traditional Orthodox attire is encouraged but not required.
**Contact:** For questions or to volunteer, please speak with any Event Committee member or call the church office.
We look forward to celebrating this holy season together as a community!
